definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Many farm also actively explore some personalized service to appeal to consumers.
sentences.chinese: 不少農家樂還積極開拓一些個性化服務吸引消費者。

sentences.english: Here they had been trying to create a weekend idyll for the urban middle classes.
sentences.chinese: 他們曾試圖讓城市中產階級在週末來這裏享受農家樂。

sentences.english: Back to the place of beautiful lunch.
sentences.chinese: 回到美味午餐的農家樂了。

sentences.english: The farmhouse resort is a tourist product in rapid development.
sentences.chinese: “農家樂”是一種正在迅速發展的旅遊產品。

sentences.english: While getting down to the bottom, we by the way visited the Fang Shan Yard Waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 下山到山腳時，我們順便遊玩了方山大院農家樂瀑布。

definition: School of Agriculture, school of thought of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
